title: Food additives
creator_credit: Shane Mulcahy, Deborah Manners, Box Hill College of Technical and Further Education and Open Tafe
brief_description: A discussion with Dr. K. Farrer, author of “Fancy eating that” who describes the history of food additives and examines what is added and why. He also addresses the safety aspects of additives and regulations to control their use. Hosted by Peter Couchman.
creator_credit_for_label: Shane Mulcahy, Deborah Manners, Box Hill College of Technical and Further Education and Open Tafe
